group_1.textLeft: A hearty welcome to you, dear senpais!

group_1.textRight: Just what did you call us over here for?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*. I take it that you haven't realized@just yet, hm?

group_1.textRight: Realized...?

group_1.textLeft: I called you to this empty classroom for a@legitimate reason!

group_1.textRight: Well, naturally.
But you're certainly beating around the bush?

group_1.textLeft: You're both as brusque as ever, I see...@But all right.
This will be our club room from now on.@Our "provisional" club room, to be precise!

group_1.textRight: ...Club room?@You mean... after a grand total of one day?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, wonderful!
You hardly ever make that sort of expression,@Kira-senpai. It's a very fresh sight!
Yes, I created it just like I promised.@Our "Historical Research Club"!

group_1.textRight: Historical...@Research Club?

group_1.textLeft: As I mentioned yesterday...
I borrowed Komachi-senpai's name recognition@to establish the club.
As such, its members are ostensibly here to@study history.
Literary history for Kira-senpai, film history@for me,
And of course: Kamihama's local history for@Komachi-senpai!
That said, it's only "ostensibly."
In keeping with our original objective, we're@each free to do our favorite things...
...In the "personal oasis" of the Historical@Research Club.

group_1.textRight: ...Mihono.

group_1.textLeft: Yes?

group_1.textRight: ...You're amazing.

group_1.textLeft: Hee hee...
Negotiations on a scale like this are nothing to@a future film director, after all.
Now, enough talk! Let's dive right in to our@club activities!

group_1.textRight: Club activities... yeah.
Then, as club president, I'll declare our@statement of intent.
This may be called the@"Historical Research Club..."
But we'll use our time here to both pursue our@chosen fields to our hearts' content...
...And work together to aid one another in our@endeavors as Magical Girls.
How's that for a set of rules to follow?

group_1.textLeft: No objections here... But I take it we won't be@recruiting further club members?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I guess not. ...Though we could make@exceptions for other Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: No objections here either!

group_1.textRight: That's settled, then.
Well, then. Time for me to crack open one of these@local history texts I've been waiting to read...

group_1.textLeft: And I, the complete works of Ky≈çka...
And I'll get right down to researching film@history... Well, just watching films, but you know!

group_1.textRight: Is this *really* okay...?

group_1.textLeft: As far as I'm concerned, yes. To let us do what@we enjoy...
...And let us keep being ourselves.@That's what this club is here for.
Isn't that right, Mihono?
Exactly!
Is something wrong, Komachi-senpai?

group_1.textRight: Nah.
...It's nothing.
